title: Smart Data Models - RegularIntervalSchedule
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The schedule has time points where the time between them is constant.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be RegularIntervalSchedule

TimePoints.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The regular interval time point data values that define this schedule. Default: 'list'

endTime.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The time for the last time point. Default: ''

timeStep.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The time between each pair of subsequent regular time points in sequence order. Default: 0
